title: Question On Elementalist Lux Skin & Gifting PLS ANSWER
body: If I bought the 3250 rp lux skin, and someone wants to gift me the Master Edition Lux skin. Will the price be lowered for them since I already Have the original skin?????????{{champion:99}}

replies.body:
Bundles aren't eligible to be gifted, so this scenario is not possible. If you decided to pick up the bundle on your own, though, the price **would** be adjusted to accommodate the content you already own.

Let me know if you have any questions.

when is the Master Elementalist Edition Bundle going to go away, and is the elementalist ward going to be available by itself or is it only exclusive to the bundle.

Edit: Is the little elemental sphere on the ward able to be seen by both enemies and allies?

The Bundle is a regular addition to the store, so there are no plans to remove it at the moment. Afaik, the exclusive items in the bundle won't be available stand-alone but you can always pick up the bundle at a discount if you already own some content inside the bundle.

I don't see why the little elemental sphere wouldn't be viewable by everyone in the match. Check out our [Elementalist Lux FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/233073948) for more details. Let me know if you have any questions.
